        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var campusStr = current.getValue('campuses');
	if (campusStr) {
		current.setValue('state', 'creating_snapshot');
		current.setValue('failed_reason', '');
		current.update();
		var campusList = campusStr.split(',');
		try {
			var created = new SnapshotManager().createSnapshot(campusList, current, false);
			if (created) {
				current.setValue('state', 'snapshot_created');
				current.setValue('failed_reason', '');
				current.update();
			}
		} catch (error) {
			gs.error(error);
			current.setValue('state', 'failed');
			current.setValue('failed_reason', gs.getMessage('Unexpected Error, please check the system log for errors.'));
			current.update();
		}
	} else {
		current.setValue('state', 'failed');
		current.setValue('failed_reason', gs.getMessage('Please select at least one campus'));
		current.update();
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script>
